text: Etu nimite duijon ke bhi eke logote dangor koribo dibi, kheti kata somoi naha tak. Jitia kheti kata somoi hobo titia moi kata manu khan ke kobo, “Poila biya ghas khan tani kene ulai lobi aru eke logote bandhi kene rakhibi julai dibo nimite, kintu gehu khan ke dhaan ghor te joma kori rakhibi.’”
